entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is being attacked by an unknown entity.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is trying to protect Harry.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, who was standing in the entrance hall before being attacked by Moody's wand.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: An object used for magic, which is wielded by both Harry and Professor Moody.

entities.name: ferret
entities.description: A pure white ferret that was attacked by Professor Moody's wand.

relationships.description: Professor Moody's wand attacked Malfoy, who was standing in the entrance hall.
Harry has a wand that he tries to grab when he feels something white-hot graze his face.
